title: Fantastical 1.3.2
description:
what a challenge today... uploading torrents for hours without pause :O

Installation and Activation:

Click and drag Fantastical to your Applications folder
Start the CORE keygen
Enter your name
Click the Generate button
Click the Patch button
Close the keygen and block the app with Little Snitch
Start Fantastical
Click on the app icon in your menubar (right side)
Click on the Gear icon (lower right side of the window)
Click on License
Enter the name you used in the keygen (license is already entered)

Meet your new assistant. With natural language event creation, a beautiful calendar and event list, support for CalDAV (including Google Calendar delegates) automatic alarms, and instant searching, Fantastical is the calendar you'll actually enjoy using.

The easiest way to create new events
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Open Fantastical by clicking the menu bar icon or pressing a customizable keyboard shortcut
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Type in your event details and press return
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ That's it! You're back to what you were doing with a shiny, new event in your calendar!

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Best of all, Fantastical's natural language engine is expressive and intelligent so you can write in your own style.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fantastical will even recognize the location of your event and let you invite people from your Address Book to the event

Quick entry
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quickly open Fantastical by clicking the menu bar icon or pressing a customizable keyboard shortcut

Beautiful calendar and event list
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The event list and calendar allow you to easily locate and plan all of your events
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Color-coding and beautiful design let you quickly make sense of your schedule
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Change the number of events you want displayed, providing focus and convenience
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Click any event to display important details about the event

Bring Your Own Calendar (BYOC)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fantastical works with your favorite calendar applications: iCal, Entourage, or Outlook

Native CalDAV sync support built-in
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add your calendars to iCal and Fantastical will automatically sync your events
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Even better, iCal doesn't need to be running
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use Google Calendar or Yahoo! Calendar accounts (including delegate support!)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Just add your accounts to iCal and Fantastical will handle the rest

Automatic alarms
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatically add alarms to all of your new events
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Customize your alarm settings based on all-day events or timed events
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You'll never miss an important event again

Search instantly
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Instantly locate all of your events, past, present, and future
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Get important event details with a single click
